extracted_playbook.title: Update P3 Cameras
extracted_playbook.description: Update P3 cameras to firmware version MX-V4.7.2.18 or later to fix the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Mx6 Cameras
extracted_playbook.description: Update Mx6 cameras to firmware version MX-V5.2.0.61 or later to fix the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure control system devices and systems are not accessible from the internet to reduce risk of exploitation.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Control Systems Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Place control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs. Ensure VPNs are updated to the latest version and secure the connected devices.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment before deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as detailed in CISA's resources.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
